title: Error code 003
body:
Hey anyone else not able to launch a game ? 
Just getting "Something's up with our servers and preventing you from patching. Error code 003). 
Is happening to me and a few mates and nothing seems to fix it no matter what we do. 

Hopefully this is fixed sooonnn {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
Just a heads up, I've attempted to inform some of the Rioters about the situation and am waiting on confirmation that they're aware of the issue and working towards a fix. Will let you all know once I get that confirmation.

As for the issue itself, it has happened somewhat recently (during the Odyssey event) and was dealt with in a timely fashion then, and I would expect the same to come from this instance. To be clear, it's probably best to wait it out rather than attempting to re-install the game (at this point) as that will likely not help the issue for a lot of people. Attempting to repair and/or restarting the client would be better options as you wont have to re-download the whole game.

Just got a response from Riot Gehirn, and they're aware of the issue and working towards a fix.

I'll let you all know when there's more info.

I haven't received word from the Rioters yet, so the issue *may* still be present. Some players have reported that the issue temporarily resolved only to reappear shortly after, so just keep an eye on it for now.

any new response? many people can't get it fixed
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Nothing new yet. I'll let everyone know once I hear more from the Rioters.
Me 2

Quick update for everyone, Riot Gehirn has posted a response on another thread regarding the "Error 003" issue with the following statement:
> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JElgLUkn,comment-id=00110002,timestamp=2018-11-09T09:30:13.672+0000)
>
> UPDATE: We are again getting reports of players receiving the 003 Error or patcher freezing from regions around the world. We're back on the case and I'll let you know when we have another update. Sit tight and maybe check out some [League of Origin](https://watch.na.lolesports.com/en_US/league-of-origin/en) while you wait.

Link: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JElgLUkn-error-code-003?comment=00110002
This is so annoying. Why do we bother having a server status page which doesn't actually reveal anything. Do we just wait this out?

I have been experiencing this issue and think I found a fix for Windows 10. 

1. Press the windows key and R then type in "services.msc".
2. Find the service named "Secondary Log-On"
3. Right click on the service and click the restart option.

After doing this my client started working normally, hope this helps.
Hasnt worked for me
this worked for me! Thanks!
worked for me thanks
Even worse, I cannot download the client.
Same man
Me too
I also changed to na than back to oce and I was able to logg in, but I still get the message on that screen? the play button is greyed out.
bad game

Also having the issue, i followed all the official steps recommended and still not working.
Season bout to end need to get my last minute climb going.{{item:3070}}
still not working lol ive had to play other games but my friends can go onto it just fine

Yup, first got it at login screen so restarted PC, then was able to log in and play a game. After the game I'm getting the issue again. Only started today and I'm glad that I'm not the only one, so now we wait I guess. Worst possible timing considering end of ranked season is days away, plus people need to grind tokens for the Kai' Sa skin.
changed to na and then changed back to oce and worked like a charm
I fixed mine by switching regions to NA, and then switched back to OCE. It still gave me the error message but I could load in and play.
Doing this still leaves me with a grey play button :/
Just keep refreshing client and it eventually worked for me {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Same here, I thought it was just me.
You're not the center of the universe josh -.- but you're the center of mine {{sticker:katarina-love}}
Fixed now (for me).
Did you do anything or did it fix by itself?
following this post for updates

You can try and fix the issue by going to the Riot Games folder, League of Legends, RADS, Projects, lol_game_client, releases,select the most recent patch and then delete all those files. After that you should be reinstalling the new patch. Thats how I fixed mine idk about anyone else

F. 

Getting same issues. Have already tried reinstalling the client, running as admin, blah blah blah, nothing works.
1 night later and stillll nothing :(
yeah wtf its been like 12 hours and feels like they are not even trying. we should get some sort of reward for this.it feels like everyone is getting punished for doing nothing bad
im so disappointing still not working.... i wonna cry......sob.... sob.... sob....{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
